channel.title: Javascript on Dinwy's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Javascript on Dinwy's blog

item.title: Update blog version to 1.1
item.description: Blog has been updated to record my practical & creative life. Fix flexible problem in WebGL Use taxonomy Add new FontAwesome icons on the menus Fix minor bugs Truncate properly Show thumbnail Cleanup CSS

item.title: Event in JS
item.description: Preparations You have to know very basic things in JS Targets Beginner Time to read 10 - 15 mins Source code https://github.com/Dinwy/BlogCode When I just get started to learn about JS, one of the biggest question was what is the event. How computer knows that I’m sending a event? Does computer checking for updates every single time? It was a stupid question but I think other people may ask the some question.
